sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_app_eng_studio.DefaultValueProvider</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>This script include has code that programmatically sets default values for AES tables</description> <name>DefaultValueProvider</name> <script><![CDATA[var DefaultValueProvider = Class.create(); DefaultValueProvider.prototype = { initialize: function() {},
getDetailsScriptDefaultValue: function() { return "(function(file) {
" + "	// The application file being operated on is called 'file'. The function must return an object.
" + "	// The object's keys will override any calculated values from the configuration.
" + "	// Keys available to override are: name, description, launch_url, editor_url
" + "	// The fields name, description, and type should be translated values
" + "	return {};
" + "})(globalFileObjectRecord);"; },
type: 'DefaultValueProvider' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-05-13 18:41:39</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5475b7f3b7130110fe92c1508e11a98c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>DefaultValueProvider</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="App Engine Studio" source="sn_app_eng_studio">e046257545b47c84712b8779a9abd0cb</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="App Engine Studio">e046257545b47c84712b8779a9abd0cb</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5475b7f3b7130110fe92c1508e11a98c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-13 19:58:02</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
